title: Quality by design-based optimization and HP-TLC densitometric standardization ofTheobroma cacaoL. extract as a nutraceutical supplement.
abstract: Our previous studies identified the hydroalcoholic extract of defattedTheobroma cacaoL. bean (CE) as a cancer-preventive and a protective agent against chemotherapeutic-induced toxicities, specifically doxorubicin-induced heart, liver, and kidney toxicities.
